Summary: red clouds, massive, thick rolling clouds that hoverd and then moved and the clouds moved with it only leaving red mist behind.
divs: sighting detailsi walked outside to check on my horses and i looked up and notice the horizon lights over the town was red -(north)- then i turned to the left and i saw above my tree line a massive ball of thick rolling red clouds just hovering above the tree line. no sounds or noise whatsoever. from the cloud hovering over the tree line it expanded in a straight line to the right what appeared to me about a thousand feet for a minute or two, then went back to its original position leaving a heavy red mist in its path. at this time my wife, daughter, and friend are seeing this as well. i called my neighbor and he came out side and saw this as well. at this time with all the talking and yelling the red cloud started moving towards north west leaving a red mist in its trail and dissappeard. this happened on 10\24\2011 around about between 7 - 7:30 pm.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Annapolis
There were no other sightings in Annapolis on or around October 24th 2011
